page.title: 05Compton Dundon_community.2
page.content: There are many activities available to the people of Compton Dundon and the surrounding area.There is a well run {Woman's Institute}and an active{parish {council}.The village has both a{darts and a{skittles}team as well as a tug {of war team}.The activities are so varied because the age-groups are evenly spread.The main areas of employment are farming and office-jobs in nearby towns.The latter involve commuting.Although the community spirit is good there are no street parties or any other forms of celebration on special occasions.One of the most noticeable changes in the area is the {heavy increase in {traffic.}This, with the bad drainage are the main criticism of the people. Apart from these problems it is agreed that Compton Dundon is a pleasant place to live. {
